page.title: 20SPORT
page.content: Pupils from{Boxted School}go to the{tennis}courts every Wednesday with one teacher. Tennis shoes only may be worn on the court. Children under 14 must be accompanied by an adult. We have to provide our own rackets. {Cricket}is played on the village playing fields with the use of the pavilion for refreshments. They play on Saturday afternoons and matches are played on Sundays. {Football}is played on the playing fields. The pavilion is owned by the football club and the cricket club hire it to use for refreshments. If you are over 9 and live in Boxted you can join the{fishing club for 50p per season. The two most common fish are {carp and roach.}It is hoped to introduce {bream }soon.
